items.name: Espresso
items.description: Rich and bold single or double shot
items.longDescription: Espresso is the quintessential coffee experience, brewed under pressure to extract its bold, rich flavor. A favorite in Italy and around the world, it forms the base for many coffee drinks, including cappuccinos and lattes. Perfect for those who enjoy an intense coffee kick with a creamy layer of crema.

items.name: Americano
items.longDescription: The Americano is a smooth, diluted espresso drink inspired by American GIs in Italy during WWII who added water to espresso to mimic drip coffee. It retains the rich essence of espresso while offering a milder flavor profile, perfect for those who prefer a less intense coffee experience.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam
items.longDescription: Cappuccino combines the boldness of espresso with a luxurious layer of steamed milk and a light, frothy foam topping. Originating in Italy, it's a classic choice for those who enjoy a balanced, creamy texture with every sip.

items.name: Latte
items.longDescription: The Latte, meaning 'milk' in Italian, is a creamy coffee beverage made with espresso and a generous amount of steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of foam. It's perfect for those who prefer a milder coffee taste and pairs well with flavored syrups.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk
items.longDescription: The Mocha is a delightful blend of espresso, steamed milk, and rich chocolate syrup, often topped with whipped cream. Originating from Yemen, it offers a sweet and indulgent coffee experience that's perfect for chocolate lovers.

items.name: Coffee Infusion
items.description: French Press infused at your table (about 3 cups; please wait 2 minutes to push the press).
items.longDescription: Our Coffee Infusion is a table-side experience using the French Press method. This technique allows coffee grounds to steep in hot water, enhancing their natural flavors and oils for a rich, full-bodied brew. Ideal for sharing or savoring solo.

items.name: Turkish Coffee
items.description: Pulverized light roast beans blended with cardamom and sugar, boiled 3 times, as served traditionally.
items.longDescription: Turkish Coffee is a traditional preparation involving finely ground coffee beans, cardamom, and sugar boiled together. It's a rich, aromatic brew served in small cups with grounds settled at the bottom. Perfect for savoring slowly.

items.name: Café Cubano
items.description: Double-rich espresso extraction with caramelized sugar.
items.longDescription: Café Cubano is a Cuban specialty featuring espresso sweetened with sugar during the brewing process, creating a thick, syrupy coffee shot. It's a perfect blend of boldness and sweetness for an energizing treat.
